title: Mateusz Archiciński / Front-End Developer
description: Website of the young front-end developer, freelancer from the vicinity of Warsaw. He deals with refreshing the present and creating new pages of business cards. Recently, I delved into the secrets of web design and explored more complex technologies and positioning.
author: Mateusz Archiciński
ogDescription: Website of the young front-end developer, freelancer from the vicinity of Warsaw. He deals with refreshing the present and creating new pages of business cards. Recently, I delved into the secrets of web design and explored more complex technologies and positioning.

header.p: A full set of information about me.

p: Hi! My name is Mateusz. I am developing modern web pages based on HTML, CSS and JavaScript technologies.

I started my career as a Web Content Editor at one of Warsaw's interactive corporations. This position enabled me to participate in many interesting projects/campaigns conducted for various clients from the Polish and foreign markets. I had the pleasure to meet interesting people and learn a lot.
At the moment, I am looking for a permanent or a remote work, depending on client needs. If you are interested in cooperation contact me!

inWhatAmIGood.title: In what am I good
array: I work in a team and communicates

timelinePoints.title: Individual education
timelinePoints.description: Learning of issues connecting to widely comprehended concepts of front-end and web design.

timelinePoints.title: Education: Higher
timelinePoints.description: Engineering studies at the Warsaw University of Life Sciences, field of study: Informatics, specialization: Computer Systems.

timelinePoints.title: Education: Secondary
timelinePoints.description: Completion of education at the Maria Sadzewiczowa High School in Łochów on mathematical-informatic profile.

timelinePoints.title: Front-End Developer / Freelancer
timelinePoints.description: Short-term job orders to be completed remotely.

timelinePoints.title: Web Content Editor in K2 Internet S.A.
timelinePoints.description: My main responsibilities included serving various content management systems on the Web, creating a landing page, landing page, and mail pages, as well as automating work using js/nodejs server/client scripts.

timelinePoints.title: Office worker / Apprentice in GUS
timelinePoints.description: Student practice held at the Central Statistical Office in Warsaw, executed activities: internal training system tester for GUS employees with access to the Moodle cms.

timelinePoints.title: Office worker in Law Firm
timelinePoints.description: Contract employment at the Law Offices, activities performed: office work.

timelinePoints.title: Learning projects
timelinePoints.description: Made and made available projects within the framework of learning different technologies. I encourage you to visit my Github.

timelinePoints.title: Online courses
timelinePoints.description: Completion of a large number of online courses in the field of HTML5, Pug, JSON, CSS3, Less, Sass, Bootstrap, Materialize, Foundation, RWD, JS, ES6, jQuery, AngularJS, AJAX, Angular Material, NodeJS, NPM, Bower, Gulp, MongoDB, Mongoose, PHP, WordPress, MySql, Git and Photoshop.

skillsTechnologies.p: Selected skills and technologies which I use in his projects on a daily basis.

header.p: Check out what I can offer you.

services.title: Coding PSD to HTML/CSS/JS
services.description:
Cutting and coding to HTML5, CSS3
and JavaScript of the delivered
graphics project of your websites,
mailings, WordPress templates
and others.

services.title: Customization for various browsers and devices
services.description:
Customization the websites
for all or selected browsers
and mobile devices with
different resolutions (so-called
Responsive web design).

services.title: Administration of your websites
services.description:
Implementation and maintenance
of the website/application
including periodical reports
from automated and manual tests
of all or selected features.

services.title: SPA / Single page applications
services.description:
Creation of an entire
web application client layer
or selected components based
on the AngularJS framework,
HTML5, CSS3, ES6/TypeScript.

services.title: API / Application programming interfaces
services.description:
Creation of an entire server layer
or selected services to provide
access server resources over HTTP
protocol based on the Express
framework.

header.p: Projects created by me, independently as well as in the group.
